document_data.name: Daeclander Illance
document_data.mainbody: '''Daeclander Illance''' was the head of House [[Illance]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: His retinue of armsmen and announcers had matching [[horse]]s.
document_data.Activities: According to [[Arclath Delcastle]], Daeclander arrived early to court events he could not afford to ignore, because he needed time to sample the luxuries on other and had much shady business to attend to before the [[War Wizards]] and [[highknights]] started eavesdropping on him.
document_data.Relationships: He was married to [[Velyandra Illance]]. He had at least nine children, the oldest of which was [[Rothglar Illance]].
document_data.History: Daeclander and his retinue arrived at court in [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, during preparations for the [[Council of the Dragon]]. They were spotted by Arclath Delcastle and [[Delnor]] from the door of the [[Dragonriders Club]].
